item.description:
You are invited to a repeat program with Allan Hughes, DC If you missed this recent event at the Scandinavian Living Center, Allan will be repeating it via a teleseminar.

You have to live in the world, but you don't have to live with its fears and anxieties 24/7. You don't have to let fear prevent you from leading a full, rich life. Experience how it feels to leave fear behind and find the peace that meditation brings.

Register by emailing mhughes@sos.org to receive the phone number and access number. Please put teleseminar in the subject line.
item.how_to_find_us: This is a teleseminar with Dr. Allan Hughes

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Teleseminar -- Learning to Live without Fear
